description: Numbers n such that fractional part of e^( Pi n^(1/2) ) > 0.99.
comments: Equivalently, let f(n) = exp(Pi*sqrt(n)); sequence gives numbers n such that ceiling(f(n))-f(n) < 1/10^2. - _Artur Jasinski_, Jan 03 2007
mathematica: a = {}; Do[If[(1 - (Exp[Pi Sqrt[x]] - Floor[Exp[Pi Sqrt[x]]]) > 0) && (1 - ( Exp[Pi Sqrt[x]] - Floor[Exp[Pi Sqrt[x]]])< 10^(-2)), AppendTo[a, x]], {x, 1, 1000}]; a - _Artur Jasinski_, Jan 03 2007
author: _Erich Friedman_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 03 2008 at the suggestion of R. J. Mathar
